abstract: Coroner's report shows that Katrina Dawson, hostage held by gunman Man Haron Monis in Sydney cafe in December, was killed by police bullet fragments; fragments ricocheted off hard surfaces in cafe as police attempted to take down Monis.
lead_paragraph: One of the two hostages who died during a 17-hour siege of a downtown Sydney cafe in December “was struck by six fragments of a police bullet or bullets, which ricocheted from hard surfaces into her body.”
snippet: One of the two hostages who died during a 17-hour siege of a downtown Sydney cafe in December “was struck by six fragments of a police bullet or bullets, which ricocheted from hard surfaces into her body.”

headline.main: Police Bullets Killed a Hostage in Sydney Cafe Siege, Inquest Is Told
headline.print_headline: Police Bullets Killed a Hostage in Sydney Cafe Siege, Inquest Is Told
